name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Calliope Mori's First 3D Birthday Concert! #calli3DBD [hrcZEjdrkRg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Calliope Mori excitedly jumps around before being advised by Takanashi Kiara to save her energy for the performance.
Calliope Mori introduces her guests: Pavolia Reine, Kureiji Ollie, Amelia Watson, and Takanashi Kiara, followed by their individual self-introductions.
The group starts a game of charades, with Calliope Mori acting out the first prompt while the others guess.

subtitles.original: Yay! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Yay! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: Oh, jump more? Okay!
subtitles.english: Oh, jump more? Okay!

subtitles.original: Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay!
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay!

subtitles.original: Save your energy, Ollie! Ollie!
subtitles.english: Save your energy, Ollie! Ollie!

subtitles.original: No, you just want to see them bounce!
subtitles.english: No, you just want to see them bounce!

subtitles.original: Kiara's giving me the good idol advice.
subtitles.english: Kiara's giving me the good idol advice.

subtitles.original: She knows what I need to be doing right now. Sorry, let me calm down.
subtitles.english: She knows what I need to be doing right now. Sorry, let me calm down.

subtitles.original: Yeah, save your energy. You have a whole performance ahead of you, right?
subtitles.english: Yeah, save your energy. You have a whole performance ahead of you, right?

subtitles.original: Yes, you are right. Thank you.
subtitles.english: Yes, you are right. Thank you.

subtitles.original: There you go.
subtitles.english: There you go.

subtitles.original: Okay. Calm.
subtitles.english: Okay. Calm.

subtitles.original: Discomposed. There we go.
subtitles.english: Discomposed. There we go.

subtitles.original: Big breath, big breath. Breathe in...
subtitles.english: Big breath, big breath. Breathe in...

subtitles.original: Oh, big breath. Breathe out.
subtitles.english: Oh, big breath. Breathe out.

subtitles.original: もっと！もっと！
subtitles.english: More! More!

subtitles.original: Breathe in... breathe out.
subtitles.english: Breathe in... breathe out.

subtitles.original: Okay. Be zen. Okay. We're fine. We're fine now.
subtitles.english: Okay. Be zen. Okay. We're fine. We're fine now.

subtitles.original: Okay, who do we have here today?
subtitles.english: Okay, who do we have here today?

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh, some of my favorite... some of my favorite ladies in the whole world.
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh, some of my favorite... some of my favorite ladies in the whole world.

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness, thank you so much for coming today.
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness, thank you so much for coming today.

subtitles.original: We have both ID and of course EN Myth being represented here.
subtitles.english: We have both ID and of course EN Myth being represented here.

subtitles.original: Please introduce yourselves, first starting from Reine, my fishing buddy.
subtitles.english: Please introduce yourselves, first starting from Reine, my fishing buddy.

subtitles.original: Yay! Attention please, I'm Pavolia Reine from Hololive ID Generation 2,
subtitles.english: Yay! Attention please, I'm Pavolia Reine from Hololive ID Generation 2,

subtitles.original: Calli's fishing buddy, also a big fan!
subtitles.english: Calli's fishing buddy, also a big fan!

subtitles.original: Everybody's a fan.
subtitles.english: Everybody's a fan.

subtitles.original: Everybody's suddenly... well, I know you guys have always been supporting me, so thanks. I appreciate it.
subtitles.english: Everybody's suddenly... well, I know you guys have always been supporting me, so thanks. I appreciate it.

subtitles.original: Thank you my sweet fishing buddy. Love you so much, Reine.
subtitles.english: Thank you my sweet fishing buddy. Love you so much, Reine.

subtitles.original: Dang. And how about... how about... how about my Apex buddy for the two times I've ever played Apex?
subtitles.english: Dang. And how about... how about... how about my Apex buddy for the two times I've ever played Apex?

subtitles.original: We've got K-K-K-K-Kureiji Ollie! Did I do it correctly?
subtitles.english: We've got K-K-K-K-Kureiji Ollie! Did I do it correctly?

subtitles.original: You did it so well! Yes! はい、こんばんは！
subtitles.english: You did it so well! Yes! Hi, good evening!

subtitles.original: Super Kawaii Zombie Idol ク……ク……ク……クレイジー・オリーです！
subtitles.english: Super Kawaii Zombie Idol K-K-K-Kureiji Ollie here!

subtitles.original: Calliou-senpai's wife/daughter/mother-in-law. Our relationship is a little bit foggy here, but good to be here!
subtitles.english: Calliou-senpai's wife/daughter/mother-in-law. Our relationship is a little bit foggy here, but good to be here!

subtitles.original: Eh? Hold on, I didn't get the memo for the... wait, did you say wife? Wife? Hmm?
subtitles.english: Eh? Hold on, I didn't get the memo for the... wait, did you say wife? Wife? Hmm?

subtitles.original: You proposed to me!
subtitles.english: You proposed to me!

subtitles.original: Yeah, but you tricked me!
subtitles.english: Yeah, but you tricked me!

subtitles.original: It doesn't count. Oh, you guys! I've been tricked by Ollie.
subtitles.english: It doesn't count. Oh, you guys! I've been tricked by Ollie.

subtitles.original: Oi, oi, oi, Ollie, you watch yourself.
subtitles.english: Oi, oi, oi, Ollie, you watch yourself.

subtitles.original: Next up, we've got Holo EN's number one detective Amelia Watson. Introduce yourself!
subtitles.english: Next up, we've got Holo EN's number one detective Amelia Watson. Introduce yourself!

subtitles.original: Amelia Watson! Hi Calli! Hello everybody!
subtitles.english: Amelia Watson! Hi Calli! Hello everybody!

subtitles.original: I'm Hololive Detective Amelia Watson. こんにちワトソン！
subtitles.english: I'm Hololive Detective Amelia Watson. Konnichi-Watson!

subtitles.original: I'm so happy to be here, Calli. I'm so proud of you. You look so beautiful. Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be here, Calli. I'm so proud of you. You look so beautiful. Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Watson, thank you so much. I appreciate that. Oh man, I'm so glad I get to do 3D stuff.
subtitles.english: Watson, thank you so much. I appreciate that. Oh man, I'm so glad I get to do 3D stuff.

subtitles.original: You're also doing really awesome 3D stuff too, so I hope we get to do some fun stuff in the future. やった！
subtitles.english: You're also doing really awesome 3D stuff too, so I hope we get to do some fun stuff in the future. Yatta!

subtitles.original: I can't wait. I can't wait. Let's do it!
subtitles.english: I can't wait. I can't wait. Let's do it!

subtitles.original: Yeah! And we can't forget about my idol mentor, apparently. Takanashi Kiara! Tenchou!
subtitles.english: Yeah! And we can't forget about my idol mentor, apparently. Takanashi Kiara! Tenchou!

subtitles.original: Hey! Ki-ki-ri-ki! I'm Hololive English's Phoenix and KFP owner, Takanashi Kiara!
subtitles.english: Hey! Ki-ki-ri-ki! I'm Hololive English's Phoenix and KFP owner, Takanashi Kiara!

subtitles.original: And I am apparently a pro for charades because I got the testing prompt within one second.
subtitles.english: And I am apparently a pro for charades because I got the testing prompt within one second.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, that is true. That is true. In the beginning there, you immediately knew.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, that is true. That is true. In the beginning there, you immediately knew.

subtitles.original: But that was something... that was something that you like know well. You knew that I was pretending to be an idol.
subtitles.english: But that was something... that was something that you like know well. You knew that I was pretending to be an idol.

subtitles.original: Hold on, that was... that's not because of that. I'm just really good at charades. I'll prove that, Calli.
subtitles.english: Hold on, that was... that's not because of that. I'm just really good at charades. I'll prove that, Calli.

subtitles.original: But it's also... it's also because you are just really, really good at showing those moves, expressing yourself, right?
subtitles.english: But it's also... it's also because you are just really, really good at showing those moves, expressing yourself, right?

subtitles.original: I have too much fun. I have too much fun in 3D. It's like all of a sudden I see myself like on the screen and I'm like,
subtitles.english: I have too much fun. I have too much fun in 3D. It's like all of a sudden I see myself like on the screen and I'm like,

subtitles.original: Oh man, I want to jump... I won't jump. I won't jump. I'm gonna stay calm.
subtitles.english: Oh man, I want to jump... I won't jump. I won't jump. I'm gonna stay calm.

subtitles.original: Please jump! Please jump! Please jump!
subtitles.english: Please jump! Please jump! Please jump!

subtitles.original: Ollie! Ollie! Don't tell your Senpai what to do!
subtitles.english: Ollie! Ollie! Don't tell your Senpai what to do!

subtitles.original: Sorry Ollie, I can't do that. I do gotta save my energy.
subtitles.english: Sorry Ollie, I can't do that. I do gotta save my energy.

subtitles.original: Well, shall we begin the game then? Let's go!
subtitles.english: Well, shall we begin the game then? Let's go!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Alright, first word. Here we go. First word... Oh no. How am I... Okay. Here we go.
subtitles.english: Alright, first word. Here we go. First word... Oh no. How am I... Okay. Here we go.

subtitles.original: 寿司職人
subtitles.english: Sushi Master

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh! Washing your hair?
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh! Washing your hair?

subtitles.original: Making... huh? Pizza? Horse riding?
subtitles.english: Making... huh? Pizza? Horse riding?

subtitles.original: Oh, you're frying your hair!
subtitles.english: Oh, you're frying your hair!

subtitles.original: No!
subtitles.english: No!

subtitles.original: Spaghetti? You're cooking? Playing the piano?
subtitles.english: Spaghetti? You're cooking? Playing the piano?

subtitles.original: No, xylophone? No, drum? What?
subtitles.english: No, xylophone? No, drum? What?

subtitles.original: It's like you're... you're tying your hair and then you're eating.
subtitles.english: It's like you're... you're tying your hair and then you're eating.

subtitles.original: Cooking! Cooking!
subtitles.english: Cooking! Cooking!

subtitles.original: Close!
subtitles.english: Close!

subtitles.original: Making pizza! Making ramen!
subtitles.english: Making pizza! Making ramen!

subtitles.original: You're tying your hair so like the hair doesn't go... a chef! At a restaurant!
subtitles.english: You're tying your hair so like the hair doesn't go... a chef! At a restaurant!

subtitles.original: KFP restaurant! Making dough! Making bread!
subtitles.english: KFP restaurant! Making dough! Making bread!

subtitles.original: Okay, okay. Watch this. First... Oh yes, that's it! You got it, Watson! You got it!
subtitles.english: Okay, okay. Watch this. First... Oh yes, that's it! You got it, Watson! You got it!

subtitles.original: Sushi master!
subtitles.english: Sushi master!

subtitles.original: Sushi master! I'm the sushi master.
subtitles.english: Sushi master! I'm the sushi master.

subtitles.original: I guess... I guess my sushi rolling technique, top tier.
subtitles.english: I guess... I guess my sushi rolling technique, top tier.

subtitles.original: Why did you tuck your hands behind your head?
subtitles.english: Why did you tuck your hands behind your head?

subtitles.original: Because I was... you know how...
subtitles.english: Because I was... you know how...
